website_summaries.verdict: They may not be beautiful, but the wireless Creative Sound Blaster Jam headphones are very comfortable and sound fantastic for the price.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass and well-defined highs
Charging cable can transmit audio from your computer

customer_reviews.title: For those people needing all day wear. Good for peeps with glasses too.
customer_reviews.text: Light enough to wear glasses with and to have them on your head all day long... Great sound. At first I thought the bass was not strong enough but after listening to it for a couple of weeks I'd suggest its at the right level. Microphone is surprisingly good. I was not expecting to be able to conduct phone calls but actually it was an improvement over my wired headphones in this area.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Officer

customer_reviews.title: And yes these are a great set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: So, looked at all the verified reviews. And yes these are a great set of headphones. They produce such clarity, in the crisp high and mid sections but also have a reassuring clarity in the lower frequencies. Now these are not bass busters! but very much from this, they are not lazy on the bass like many other closed ear headphones, but the lower end is so crisp that you could forgive it for not knocking you head together. They are not true audiophile headphones (you need to pay a lot more for that dynamic range) but for general music listening, Netflix, Sky, YouTube or on a tablet or smart phone, these are awesome and well recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Clark Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for under £50 price range. Cool retro design looks like the headphones you used to get with a Walkman. Paired with iPhone in seconds and even faster if you have an NFC device. The sound is good and the extra bass button works well. The main reason I was bought them was for the size as I did not want some of the massive over the ear headphones. They are also very comfy you could wear them for a long time without any problems. The only thing I don't like about them is the plasticy feel of the strap.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: After a week, I am still delighted
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent. Very lightweight..correct ear pressure..I forget I'm wearing them. Sound seems great to me, but I'm no expert. I relied on internet search for reviews, and this was rated in the top two qualitywise in its price category by several. Search no further, ignore the silly name. Tip..... To connect subsequent times, after pairing: Step 1....A long press of about 10 seconds, until green flashing light Step 2....A long press of about 7 seconds, until a green flash, and switch off Step 3....A long press of about 7 seconds, wait for slow blue flash..you are connected.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion it is the best wireless headphone you can buy within this price range
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how long these headphones have lasted me (over a year) even when I use them almost every day through rain, snow, and sunny days. These headphone are fantastic when it comes to sound quality which is certainly to be expected coming from Creative. Probably the best headphones when it comes to sound quality, being light, responsive, and wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. They make a different sound when one presses to turn them on or off. In the former case, the sequence of five notes end in a higher note than in the latter case. Also, if one turns on the Bluetooth on one's mobile first and then the Sound Blaster, the latter automatically connects.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lonergan

customer_reviews.title: I wish manufacturers would list: "Suitable for glasses"....
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones for the price and okay with glasses. Not the best sound quality, but good enough for watching TV, which is what I use them for. Comfort - okay, but they get uncomfortable after a couple of hours (again, the glasses problem).
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not that comfy. But they do the job. Good for when you're washing up and don't want to catch the wire and send your phone flying into the sink... has a lot of sound leakage so wouldn't use in public!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: poor connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Below expectations. The sound is great but connectivity is unacceptable. I use it on my pc and the Bluetooth transmitter is nearly directly in front of my face so it's not covered. If I walk away 5 steps and turn around my head the connection is gone (forget about going to another room!). I tried with another bluetooth device and it's the same. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Really light and comfortable with excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really light and comfortable with excellent sound quality. Lasts a long time on a single charge and simple pairing with bluetooth transmitters. A good match for headphones at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris A

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cheap pair of Bluetooth headphones to use in work. Sound is pretty good for the price. Easy to use. Lasts pretty well on a charge. Build quality ok, but pretty decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Saxty

customer_reviews.title: Sound good but people around you mightn't like your music choice
customer_reviews.text: Decent set of Bluetooth 🎧. Good sound but sound leaks so they are not too quiet for people around you . Would prefer if there was more padding around ears as it's foam only which in my opinion holds perspiration if u are walking with them or jogging and therefore isn't the most hygienic... But bottom line good sound .
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Very good pair of headphones bass is good and the controls ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good pair of headphones bass is good and the controls are simple I wear them to the gym though they are not that practical for that i dont care .
customer_reviews.author: truthful tee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value and service. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value and service. Works perfectly straight from the box
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headphones - light and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good headphones - light and easy to use. Reasonable sound for the price. Yes i would recommend if you are looking to spend under 50 quid.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Prew

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale; Good sound and quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Not for a Mac...
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely with iPhone and iPad. However like MANY MANY Bluetooth headsets this has a very annoying "click" every 5/6 seconds when played through a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: maxkudos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price, paired straight away, good controls and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed. Great product and great sound for that price
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Creative. You won't be disappointed. Great product and great sound for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Not very loud and pretty poor quality sound. Also really short cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my wife who really likes them sound is really good. Also now I can say what I like ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my wife who really likes them sound is really good. Also now I can say what I like and she wont hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, lightweight and long battery life but no support for PS4.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr D.

customer_reviews.title: I would receommend
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - battery life - very light - cheap - good sound quality - bluetooth Cons: - none :) - or maybe first time set up can be a little bit annoying
customer_reviews.author: Neversaid

customer_reviews.title: For the money ... An excellent choice of wireless Headphone
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound quality, nice fit.. Sync'd to two phones, and works well with both at same time. signal is clear and strong when phone is in a pocket, or on the other side of a room. Can't ask for much more than that! Can also be used with PC with accompanying USB cable, although it's a bit short for use with a desktop, even on when my desktop is ON my desk.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I am not going to pontificate about the pro's and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to pontificate about the pro's and cons of these wireless headphones.They have no cons. They are just a multi-talented bit of kit sold at a very generous price. Go and buy a pair or two now. Thanks Creative. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MR H.

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit
customer_reviews.text: Sound's Great but Loose Fit. (Not Suitable For Gym Use) Not Satisfied 😕
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: First class product for price , good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: First class for price , does everything I require , good sound , would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones for this Price
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headphones for this Price. I was extremely surprised at the very high audio quality, and that's bearing in mind that these are Bluetooth which compresses the sound for the wireless transfer. These aren't bass machines if that's what your looking for, but they have extremely crisp clear sound. The bild quality isnt super strong, but it is flexibls and good quality and despite its old style plastic headbamd and foam ear covers theu are also well designed and comfotable not to mention they look good, again two qualities that surprised me. All in all Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Hindolo

customer_reviews.title: NO BASS !!!
customer_reviews.text: Build Quality OK Sound & Bass Quality .. not so much :(
customer_reviews.author: D Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Ok for gym and runs
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - light - easy to use - great battery - bluetooth range Cons: - avrege sound quality - cheap feel - a bit pricey for the quality I used them for gym purposes only and they are fantastic. If used in a quiet place people can hear what you are listening to.
customer_reviews.author: Bertie

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these. The sound quality is great considering the price and they seem to last a decent length of time between charges and battery holds its charge well during times of no use.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerseed

customer_reviews.title: JAM Nitty Gritty
customer_reviews.text: It said the batteries go 12 hours on a full charge. I only got to 7 before I was bored. It's good, cheap and gets rid of the cable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Both the build and sound quality are fine. Not top end of the market but then again they're not hundreds of pounds.Comfortable and certainly loud enough. A great buy
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. J. Garland

customer_reviews.title: Love these the sound is full and lively without the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these the sound is full and lively without the excessive treble on many headphones. Worth every penny and works so easily with my iphone7 over bluetooth. A headphone that sounds as good as many more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: NICK CRASKE

customer_reviews.title: Great BT Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for several months now and I love them. Sound is great, charge lasts ages and BT connection is solid. I have other more expensive headphones but this is my goto choice.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: poor Win8 driver support)
customer_reviews.text: Cons: some bugs appear with Win8 and Skype, but probably it's just my laptop drivers (Dell 3720, poor Win8 driver support). Do not expect perfect sound, but for me it's just more than enough for everyday Skype conversations. Pros: Good range (works perfect inside the apartment building).Fast NFC setup with Sony Z3 tablet. Really lightweight. Fast dispatch (bought at Hungry Weasels).
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: The headset is very comfortable and has great battery life
customer_reviews.text: The headset is very comfortable and has great battery life. The Audio quality is pretty poor(being very quiet) and when the volume is increased they leak alot of sound. There is also some very audible noise when playing music.
customer_reviews.author: PaulN

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you just can't beat the price. Excellent sound , easy to connect to bluetooth. Can't fault.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product does not connect via Bluetooth to a lot of my devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor - avoid
customer_reviews.text: The sounds works intermittently. Although some controls still show as the device is connected to the laptop, there is no sound. Also, the supporting software is very poorly designed. Not many features and no Unistall.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Diamantopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic pair of headphones. Quality is superb and the battery lasts all day.I had them on for three days with semi-regular usage and they didn't even blink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the price that sound very good and the battery lasts ages
customer_reviews.text: For the price that sound very good and the battery lasts ages. Only criticism is that the mic is not the best
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. J. Mccall

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headphones, easy to use and fantastic price, no wires for children to break!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Mckeown

customer_reviews.title: Great but controls could be better
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. Well made and good sound quality. Battery seems to last really well. However, my main gripe with them is that you have to hold the power button down for quite a long time to turn them on or off which is awkward and uncertain. Why do modern technology companies have such a big problem with simple on/off switches? They are great!
customer_reviews.author: MattB

product_meta.title: Creative Sound Blaster JAM - headset.
product_meta.description: The ultra-light, wireless Bluetooth headset Sound Blaster JAM ensures undisturbed comfort whenever and wherever you go.
feature_bullets: Ultra-light Bluetooth Headset for Smartphones / iPhone / iPad / Tablet
Comfortable to wear, even for longer music enjoyment thanks to the soft ear pads.
Portable all around - The Sound Blaster Jam is easy to carry with you.
With the Sound Blaster JAM you can enjoy up to 12 hours of pure listening pleasure.
Box contents: Sound Blaster JAM headset, USB cable (1 m), quick start guide, warranty instructions (English language not guaranteed).

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
